name: Kill Your Boss
storyline: You are a CIA agent who has been ordered to infiltrate a criminal organization. In a brutal world where you can trust no one, you must be ready to betray anyone, anytime. ...Even if it's the person you love.
summary: Kill Your Boss is an original maybe series. The book has you play as Alex Miller, a CIA agent working undercover at a violent organization. After signing up to become a CIA agent to protect his sickly, younger sister, Hailey, he finds that he's gained more than he's bargained for when he catches the eye of three prime players in this twisted game. Torn between the bonds he's formed in the violent organization and the CIA, Alex realizes he must quickly decide where his loyalties lie. Will he be able to come out of this situation unscathed?
